title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Learn the basics of cybersecurity and common security practices

sections.title: What is Cybersecurity?
sections.content: Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks. These cyberattacks are usually aimed at accessing, changing, or destroying sensitive information; extorting money from users; or interrupting normal business processes.

sections.title: Common Security Threats
sections.content: Common security threats include: 1) Malware: Malicious software that can harm your computer 2) Phishing: Deceptive attempts to steal sensitive information 3) Social Engineering: Manipulating people into giving up confidential information 4) Ransomware: Software that threatens to publish or block access to data unless a ransom is paid
